description: wood pendant carved with pair of three-dimensional twisted elements at top and bottom edges; carved bands around top and bottom ends and flanking twisted elements; radiating arcs on each side next to bands at wide end; silver wire embellishments on arcs on front with additional applied silver element below and wire embellishment at short end; silver cap on short end tipped with three-dimensional triangle shaped element; silver cap on wide end has cross design at end
dimension:
10 5/16 x 4 3/16 x 2 1/8 in. (26.19 x 10.64 x 5.4 cm) (without chain)
32 5/16 in. (82.07 cm) (object part, chain length)
markings: on collar at wide end, on sticker: [86-87-3]
title: Horn-shaped pendant with chain
